top.title: Trump says world has 10 days to see if Iran agrees deal or 'bad things happen'
top.summary: The US is surging forces to the Middle East amid negotiations with the Islamic Republic over its nuclear programme.

top.title: Austrian climber found guilty after girlfriend froze to death on mountain
top.summary: The woman died of hypothermia during a climbing trip on the Grossglockner mountain in January 2025.

top.title: Venezuelan opposition politician released after amnesty law passed
top.summary: Juan Pablo Guanipa announces that he has been freed after "almost nine months" of imprisonment.

top.title: Urgent research needed to tackle AI threats, says Google AI boss
top.summary: But the head of the US delegation at the AI Impact Summit in Delhi says: "We totally reject global governance of AI."

top.title: Microsoft error sees confidential emails exposed to AI tool Copilot
top.summary: The company says it has addressed the issue and it "did not provide anyone access to information they weren't already authorised to see".

top.title: Asos co-founder dies after Thailand apartment block fall
top.summary: Quentin Griffiths co-founded Asos in 2000 and remained a significant shareholder after leaving the firm five years later.
